meta.name: description
meta.content: United ISD, 'A' Rated District in Laredo, Texas. SECOND CONSECUTIVE YEAR! UISD provides the best quality education on all our Laredo schools to its students.

div.aria-label: Online Learning Middle and High School

section.class: section section-padded hidden-xs hidden-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl

div.p:
What’s cooking? Take a look at our district’s lunch menus, calorie counts and much more.
More Info

United ISD is a great place to work. Join our team. We provide equal opportunities to all employees for employment.
More Info

Online student registration portal.
More Info

div.class: row visible-xs visible-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl

div.p: What’s cooking? Take a look at our district’s lunch menus, calorie counts and much more.
United ISD is a great place to work. Join our team. We provide equal opportunities to all employees for employment.

hr.p: UNITED, we inspire all students to become responsible world citizens by pursuing excellence through life-long learning.

div.p: Paying for school activities just got easier with our online payment.
Your source for information and current events for your district and campus.
United ISD’S parent newsletter to stay current on what’s happening.

div.h4: United ISD Grab and Go Meals Information Posted Date: 03/19/2020
div.p: Beginning Monday, March 23rd, drive-through food distribution will be offered at select school sites across the District. Meals kits will be provided to any child 18 years old and younger... . . .

div.h4: Statement To All UISD Parents/Guardians Posted Date: 03/17/2020
div.p: I want to assure you that United ISD continues to monitor all issues pertaining to COVID-19 and has the best interest of our students and staff members in mind as it determines the District’s response . . .

div.p:
Welcome to our Powell Watson
Motors dealership! We are here to
make sure you get exactly the vehicle you want. Our staff is dedicated to
offering you top-notch service.

img.alt: blue cross blue shield of texas logo

div.p:
At Blue Cross Blue Shield, we take corporate responsibility seriously, building and supporting programs
that positively impact healthcare in communities across America.

div.span: Catch the latest. Share your thoughts. Stay connected.

span.span: It is the policy of United ISD not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, handicap in its programs, services or activities as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.

Es política de United ISD no discriminar por motivos de raza, color, nacionalidad, sexo, discapacidad en sus programas, servicios o actividades como lo requieren el Título VI de la Ley de Derechos Civiles de 1964, según su enmienda; el Título IX de las Enmiendas a la Educación de 1972 y la Sección 504 de la Ley de Rehabilitación de 1973, según su enmienda.

div.p: We inspire all students to become responsible world citizens by pursuing excellence through life-long learning
